message.body: weird question... are you going to be here before the weekend of 09/15?
Yes I will be in town tonight tomorrow and through early Sunday. I won't be in town next weekend.
... Now I'm kind of afraid to ask why
How hard is it to bake a cake?
Okay. Getting on road now so won't be able to look until I get to town or take a rest stop
It doesn't look hard, just time-consuming. When did you want to do this? (also I'd substitute frosting for the raspberry stuff.)
Not sure. I know your time is limited
I'm free tomorrow in the late morning and early afternoon, or Sunday morning with notice. Go you have a mixer and the pan you need and such?
Haha nope... Ok so bakery it is
:) thank you. I'll let you know how it goes?
Are you around? I'm in town and have a couple of hours free. I want to see the tattoo!
Hey I'm in the kop area most of today but will be in the city later. Whatchu up to?
